settings.text:
Margot Elena delights with the most beautiful bath & beauty luxuries from our coveted brand libraries – Lollia, TokyoMilk, Archive, Library of Flowers, the Cottage Greenhouse and Infinite She. Perfect to give, even better to keep! Interested in becoming an M.E. all things beautiful Affiliate? Let’s connect, we’d love to hear from you!

The benefits

- Earn commission with a 30-day cookie window
- Everyday free shipping $85+
- Regular updates on new collections
- Affiliate-only special offers & promotions
- Free products
- Stunning creative
- Product feed updated daily

What do I do as an affiliate?

Earn commissions for sharing and promoting Margot Elena luxuries. Add your affiliate link(s) to your website, social content, blogs, posts, YouTube videos and marketing emails. You can also host an optional product feed on your site.

 

How to join

Simply fill our online registration form here and we’ll contact once we have reviewed your site. Should you have any questions, feel free to email affiliates@margotelena.com.
